Vex is a 13th-level spellcaster. Her spell-casting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following ranger spells prepared:
• 1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, hunter's mark (see bonus actions) • 2nd level (3 slots): pass without trace, protection from poison • 3rd level (3 slots): lightning arrow, nondetection • 4th level (1 slot): freedom of movement, grasping vine

trait.name: Trinket
trait.text: Trinket moves and acts on Vex's turn, and Vex can use a bonus action to command him to take the Dash, Dodge, Disengage, or Attack action. She can also command him to Attack as part of her Multiattack action (see below). Trinket can take only one action on each of Vex's turns.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Vex makes two ranged attacks, and can command Trinket to move up to his speed and use his Multiattack action.

action.name: Fenthras
action.text:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, range 600 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (1d8 + 18) piercing damage and 3 (1d6) lightning damage, and Vex can use the following ability:
Bramble Shot (2/Short Rest). The attack deals an extra 18 (4d8) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be restrained.
The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Cunning Action (Bonus Action)
action.text: Vex takes the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

action.name: Hunter's Mark (Bonus Action)
action.text: Vex casts hunter's mark to mark a creature she can see within 90 feet of her. For 1 hour, Vex's weapon attacks deal an extra 1d6 damage to the marked creature, and she has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) and Wisdom (Survival) checks made to find it.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
reaction.text: When an attacker that Vex can see hits her with an attack, she takes half damage from the attack.

monster.spells: cure wounds, hunter's mark, pass without trace, protection from poison, lightning arrow, nondetection, freedom of movement, grasping vine
monster.description: Source: Tal'Dorei Campaign Setting: Reborn p. 267

monster.name: Vos'skyriss Serpentfolk Ghost
monster.resist: acid, fire, lightning, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, poisoned, prone, restrained

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
trait.text: The ghost can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
trait.text: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The ghost makes two spear attacks.

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. If the ghost makes a ranged attack, its spear rematerializes in its hands after the attack is resolved.

action.name: Etherealness
action.text: The ghost enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

action.name: Terrifying Hiss
action.text: The ghost emits an uncanny, rasping hiss. Each non-undead creature within 30 feet of the ghost that can hear it must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the condition on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this ghost's Terrifying Hiss for the next 24 hours.

monster.description: Source: Tal'Dorei Campaign Setting: Reborn p. 258

monster.name: Vos'skyriss Serpentfolk

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text:
The serpentfolk can hold its breath for 30 minutes. Innate Spellcasting. The serpentfolk's innate spell-casting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
• At will: animal friendship, speak with animals (snakes only) • 2/Day each: sleep, suggestion • 1/Day: pass without trace

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The serpentfolk makes two scimitar attacks.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

action.name: Scimitar
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Constrict
action.text:
Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13).
Until this grapple ends, the creature is restrained, and the serpentfolk can't constrict another target.

monster.spells: animal friendship, speak with animals, sleep, suggestion, pass without trace
monster.description: Source: Tal'Dorei Campaign Setting: Reborn p. 258

monster.name: Wraithroot Tree

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: While the wraithroot tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

trait.name: Wraith Shift
trait.text: On its turn, the wraithroot tree can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. The tree does not provoke opportunity attacks while moving, and must finish its movement in a space unoccupied by any Large or larger objects or creatures. Any Medium or smaller creature in the tree's space when it finishes moving is pushed to the nearest unoccupied space of the creature's choice. Medium or smaller objects in the tree's space are pushed to the nearest unoccupied spaces of the tree's choice.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The wraithroot tree makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Wraithstorm (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The wraithroot tree pulls life energy from the area around it, leaving creatures temporarily frail. Each creature that is not a construct or undead within 30 feet of the tree must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or have its speed halved and gain vulnerability to bludgeoning damage until the end of the tree's next turn.

monster.description: Source: Tal'Dorei Campaign Setting: Reborn p. 259

monster.name: Young Magma Landshark
monster.speed: walk 40 ft., burrow 40 ft., swim 40 ft. (lava only)

trait.name: Searing Presence
trait.text: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the landshark takes 11 (2d10) fire damage.

trait.name: Standing Leap
trait.text: The landshark's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Illumination
trait.text: The landshark sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 31 (4d12 + 5) piercing damage, and 14 (4d6) fire damage.

action.name: Deadly Leap
action.text: If the landshark jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a DC 16 Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked prone and take 19 (4d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked prone, and is pushed 5 feet out of the landshark's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is within range, the creature instead falls prone in the landshark's space.

monster.description: Source: Tal'Dorei Campaign Setting: Reborn p. 248
